# Limitations, gripes, and fallacies

## Limitations of **secr**

**secr** cannot hope to cover many of the innovations in the SECR world. 
We note specifically --

* random effects other than finite mixture models [references in @McClintock2021]
* partial identity models [@Augustine2018]
